clinical_study.brief_title: Beta-1,3/1,6-D-Glucan Ganoderma Lucidum on Ulcerative Colitis
clinical_study.official_title: The Role of Beta-1,3/1,6-D-Glucan From Mycelium Extract of Indonesian Ganoderma Lucidum on Ulcerative Colitis: A Double-Blind Randomized Controlled Trial

brief_summary.textblock: The aim of this study is to determine the efficacy and safety of Beta-1,3/1,6-D-Glucan from mycelium extract of Ganoderma lucidum on ulcerative colitis

primary_outcome.measure: Change in Quality of Life: SF-36 questionnaire
primary_outcome.description: Quality of Life is assessed by Indonesian validated Short Form 36 (SF-36) questionnaire. This questionnaire consist of 36 items/questions that evaluate quality of life in some elements. The elements are change in health (1 item), general health perception (5 items), energy/fatigue (4 items), mental health (5 items), social functioning (2 items), pain (2 items), physical functioning (10 items), role limitations due to emotional problems (3 items) and role limitations due to physical problems (4 items). The score from each question will be summed. Minimum score is 36 and maximum score is 138. Higher score indicates higher quality of life and lower score indicates lower quality of life. Higher score post intervention administration represents a positive outcome

secondary_outcome.description: Level of CRP is obtained from laboratory test.
ESR is obtained from laboratory test.

secondary_outcome.measure: Change of Tumor Necrosis Factor Alpha (TNF-α) level
secondary_outcome.description: Level of TNF-α is obtained from laboratory test
Level of IL-6 is obtained from laboratory test
Level of fecal calprotectin is obtained from stool examination

Mayo score is assessed from colonoscopy. 0 = normal 1 = mild (erythema, decreased vascular pattern, mild friability) 2 = moderate (marked erythema, absent vascular pattern, friability, erosions) 3 = severe (spontaneous bleeding, ulceration)

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of patients with neutrophils infiltrating crypt epithelium in colon biopsy
secondary_outcome.description: Colon biopsy is obtained from colonoscopy and histopathology examination

other_outcome.measure: Number of participants with adverse events (AEs)
other_outcome.description: Number of participants with AE in this study

other_outcome.measure: Number of participants with serious adverse events (SAEs)
other_outcome.description: Number of participants with SAEs in this study

arm_group.description: This group received capsule contains 180 mg Beta-1,3/1,6-D-Glucan from mycelium extract of Ganoderma lucidum with dose 3x1 capsule a day for 90 days
This group received empty capsule with dose 3x1 capsule a day for 90 days

intervention.description: Beta-1,3/1,6-D-Glucan capsule three times daily for 90 days
Placebo capsule three times daily for 90 days

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- age ≥18 years old
- ulcerative colitis patients who are treated by 5-aminosalicylic acid (5-ASA) 3x500 mg
- agreed to participate in this study
Exclusion Criteria:
- ulcerative colitis patients who are treated by corticosteroid, immunosuppressive agents and biologic agents
- allergic to Ganoderma lucidum
- could not be randomised and participate in this study by clinical judgement
